title: Season 6 rewards
body:
Hello community!
So I got into masters today at around 2:00am and now I'm at 0 lps.
 I heard from a friend that people who just got to masters and are at 0 lps wont get the master rewards but the diamond ones( like its a way riot combats boosters) and I was wondering if that is actually true because I really want to get the Master rewards .
Thanks Anticipated!

replies.body: Sorry, your friend is stupid. there is no "combat boosters" type of thing because riot has no way to tell and would punish actual players, such as yourself possibly, you get masters rewards.
Ur friend is probably trying to worry you for no reason xD
Well he succeded for sure at least :D
What your friend told you made 0 sense. If your in masters, you should get masters, If your in diamond 1, you get diamond 1 loot.

yeah I know it doesn't really make sense but I wanted to be 100% sure. 
"better safe then sorry"
Also I didn't play any games in master.
I doubt it too but just wanted to be sure
